long_description: The REI Lila half-zip top for girls offers comfort, warmth and rugged style. It takes a girl from the trail to the classroom and everywhere in between. Polyester fabric wicks moisture for all-day comfort. Mock neck with half zip offers warmth and breathability; chin guard helps protect young skin. Raglan sleeves ensure ease of movement; side panels feature a touch of spandex for stretch. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The REI Lila half-zip top for girls offers comfort, warmth and rugged style. It takes a girl from the trail to the classroom and everywhere in between.
